short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MindTree: Turn your linear ChatGPT chats into visual mindmaps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 1.2.2: Fix bugs caused by the html changes of ChatGPT page.

** New feature **: take notes📝 and add link🔗 to a topic

MindTree transforms your back-and-forth ChatGPT chats into super cool mind maps. Think of it as turning a bunch of text messages into a picture that shows all your thoughts with connections. It’s perfect for folks who love seeing the big picture and hate getting lost in a sea of words.

# Cool Stuff It Does

🖼️ Whole Picture: Flips your chat into an awesome network of ideas.
🤔 Intuitive FAQs: Fast-track your understanding of any subject.
🔍 Dive Deep: One-click dive into any part of the mind map.
🔄 Draggable Editing: Quickly reorganize your mindmap.
📥 Export Image/Markdown: Download your mindmap as png or markdown.
📝 Notes & links: Notes and links connected to topic.

# Why You’ll Love MindTree

⚡ Find Stuff Fast: No more scrolling through chats forever but spot in a flash.
💡 Boost Creativity: Your second brain that helps you connect the dots.
🎓 Learn Like a Boss: Visual maps make stuff stick in your brain better.
🧠 Universal Mindmaps: Always a mind map suitable for your scenario.

# Empower Your Experience Using ChatGPT

With MindTree, you can take the dynamic flow of your conversation and lay it out in a colorful mind map, making it easier to track your train of thought and see the connections between different ideas. Whether you're a student, professional, or lifelong learner, MindTree is your go-to for making sense of the chaos.

🚀🚀Ready? Let’s map your mind out! 🎉
